content: oversized cosy and so easy to crochet the doveport cardigan is the crochet sweater you need in your wardrobe this minimalist design is so versatile and beginner friendly you ll want to crochet a cardi in every colour with a simple bottom up construction the body is worked flat and entirely in one piece with the sews sewn onto the armhole openings the body and sleeve length is customisable alteration instructions provided and 3 different neckline finishing options this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl skill level beginner
